description.name: paygatedottohosted
description.tagline: Credit Cards - Debit Cards - SEPA Bank Transfer Hosted Mode (paygate.to)
description.long: Instant approval High Risk Merchant Gateway with instant payouts to your USDC Polygon wallet. Multi-Providers credit card hosted payment gateway with automatic customer geo location detection for highest conversion and maximum security.
features: Accept all major credit and debit cards including Visa and Mastercard directly on your site
Instant payouts to your USDC Polygon wallet
ZERO Chargebacks all payments are final.
